alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN HOUSTON... JACKSON...WEST CENTRAL DECATUR AND SEMINOLE COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/... At 610 PM EDT/510 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Chattahoochee, or 15 miles east of Marianna, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Chattahoochee, Malone, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Alford, Bascom, Reynoldsville, Crosby, Little Hope, Blue Spring, Union City, Lovedale, Dellwood, Riverturn, Star, Hornsville, Alliance, and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
